Bill L.D. 1619: In July 2021, Governor Janet Mills signed into law L.D. 1619, sponsored by Senator Mark Lawrence. With some exceptions, the law permanently banned the development of all offshore wind projects in Maine state waters but allowed the permitting of offshore wind in federal waters if the Governor’s Energy Office developed a planned research strategy for such projects by March 2023. The law also created the Offshore Wind Research Consortium
